mapper.select: SELECT SPACE_ID, SPACE_IMG, SPACE_TITLE, SPACE_SIZE, SPACE_PERSON, SPACE_POS, SPACE_HOST FROM SPACE_LIST WHERE SPACE_ID = #{SPACE_ID}
SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE FROM USER_LIST WHERE USER_VISIBLE ='N' AND USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RES_LIST( USER_ID, USER_PHONE, RES_EMAIL, RES_NAME, RES_SPACE_ID, RES_NUM, RES_APPLY_DATE, RES_CONTENT, RES_REQ, RES_PRI ) VALUES( #{USER_ID}, #{PHONE}, #{EMAIL}, #{NAME}, #{SPACE_ID}, #{RES_NUM}, #{RES_APPLY_DATE}, '', #{RES_REQ}, #{RES_PRI} )
mapper.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY RES_APPLY_DATE) RNUM, RES.* FROM( SELECT R.RES_APPLY_DATE, R.RES_NUM, S.SPACE_ID, S.SPACE_TITLE, S.SPACE_IMG, R.RES_PRI, S.SPACE_POS, S.SPACE_SIZE, R.RES_NAME, R.USER_PHONE, R.RES_EMAIL, S.SPACE_PERSON FROM SPACE_LIST S INNER JOIN RES_LIST R ON S.SPACE_ID = R.RES_SPACE_ID WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND
RES_APPLY_DATE < SYSDATE
RES_APPLY_DATE >= SYSDATE
)RES
mapper.update: UPDATE RES_LIST SET RES_NAME = #{NAME}, RES_EMAIL = #{EMAIL}, USER_PHONE = #{TEL} WHERE RES_NUM = #{RES_NUM}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY_LIST( SPACE_ID, USER_ID, REPLY_NUM, REPLY_TITLE, REPLY_CNT, REPLY_CMT, REPLY_IMG, REPLY_DATE, REPLY_DEL ) VALUES( #{SPACE_ID}, #{USER_ID}, REPLY_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{TITLE}, #{CONTENT}, '', #{FILE_NAME}, SYSDATE, 'N' )
INSERT INTO MESSAGE_BOX( USER_ID, M_ID, M_TITLE, M_CONTENT, M_DATE, READ_CHECK ) VALUES( #{USER_ID}, MSG_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{TITLE}, #{CONTENT}, SYSDATE, 'N' )
